question: The reaction of two equivalents of $Mg$ with 1,4-dibromobutane produces compound $A$. The reaction of $A$ with two equivalents of $CH_3CHO$ (acetaldehyde), followed by work-up with dilute aqueous acid, produces compound $B$, having the formula $C_8H_{18}O_2$. What are the structures of $A$ and $B$?
